reviews.review: the best end i have seen before
amazing game just beat it again today and will always recommend this classic puzzler

portal 2 is pretty solid, though i still would rather play the first. this one is great with much more charm, but the puzzles can oftentimes be a lot more annoying and challenging late-game, and late-game as a whole kind of sucks besides the very last few chambers. you just want to get to the end already, and it feels chapter 7 and 8 are both filler. tldr; too long, but if you chug through that, it ends up being a pleasant experience

this game has been my favorite ever since it came out on the ps3. the characters are excellent, the puzzles are challenging, and the game itself is beautiful. i would recommend this game to everyone. this has been my first time playing it on pc, but my 5th time playing overall, if you can afford it, buy it.
Juegardo para jugar con gente que si le gusta usar su cerebro. Un juego solo para mentes subdesarolladas ndea
wheatley is the greatest british man of all time
A classic. Very unique game mechanics. The solutions to the problems feel very satisfying, as they usually involve you catapulting through scary open spaces and the like.

Bardzo ciekawa i ładna gra logiczna, sporo plansz w samej grze a jak doliczy się dodatki i plansze z warsztatu to gra jest ogromna - polecam serdecznie wszystkim, którzy lubią pogłówkować dla relaksu :)
Su historia y voces dobladas me parecen fantasticas, aparde de que su jugabilidad es bastante buena.

"Speedy thing goes in, speedy thing comes out"

-mean robot lady
I love Portal 2 becuse the story is sofascinwaitonb fancinating
I love this game and regret not buying it during the Winter sale
Uma das melhores Franquias que eu já joguei da valve.

Way better than the first part. 
One of the best puzzle games available
jogo pika q tu entra em buracos coloridos, há somente um problema, meu parceiro vini q é burro pa garai.
jogo divertido pra carai, tirando o c4 que é burro e nao sabe os paranaue
i love portal 2 it is a very good game especially since it was made in 2011 it is very worth it and i recommend getting it, the lighting and characters have very good designs and are very well made

final: muy bueno pero te vas a enojar mucho pero una joya.
Always wanted to play. really fun, you don't need to play the first one to understand the story, but you should. good story, graphics, music and gameplay
Very good, great puzzles, great story, great jokes, great game
If you like puzzles you'll like this game
Instant classic of a game. The voice acting work by Stephen Merchant makes it so enjoyable.
Игра для любителей головоломок. Если вы не такой, то стоит покупать игру только для мультиплеера, имхо.

Bought this game a while back, and it's still one my favorite game of all time. Still holds up to games released today imo. Even though the campaign is only a few hours long, most of my playtime in this game has come from me replaying it over and over again. I love everything about this game, from the witty humor, to the level design, and the amazing music. I would recommend this to anyone who hasn't played a valve game before, the game is easy to pick up for new players, and you are free to play at your own pace. All in all, if you want a great game with a great story, this is it, even if the engine and graphics are a bit dated.

Happy Portalling!

Stupendous. I cannot describe how good this game is (it says I've only played this for 4.9 hours, but this is my first playthrough on PC. I have beat the game 4 other times on Xbox 360). Buy this game. What are you waiting for. Great dialouge, atmosphere, and story. Hell, even the graphics still hold up by today's standards. And it's only 10 bucks! Just buy it already!
Jeu assez cours en COOP mais toujours cool d'y joué à deux. L'histoire est vraiment bien la qualité graphique est très belle pour un jeu sortie en 2011.

La verdad es que este juego se merece estar casi al mismo nivel que el Half Life 2, debido a que la historia es increible, los graficos son demasiado buenos y la optimizacion del source sigue presente. Le da un cierre a la historia de portal de una manera magnifica y el multijugador es muy divertido. Un juego que disfrute mucho y que he rejugado varias veces, totalmente recomendado.

Great game.
I have lot of fun playing multiplayer mode with my friend.
Хорошая игра, где вас назовут жирной несколько раз, расскажут интересную историю, и уровни, где придется подумать. Так же имеется кооп, который очень не плох
Amazing story, cool secrets, fun to play
Пиздатая игра не приебешься почти ни к чему, хотя 1 часть прошлась более за двух часов.
Portal 2 foi um dos melhores jogos que joguei, recomendo muito!!

simplesmente incrivel, uma versão melhorada do primeiro Portal com uma história que te cativa e puzzles bem planejados, graficos ótimos pra época que dão conta até hoje e um trabalho de dublagem perfeito com dialogos e tempo pra piada ótimos, unico defeito que achei é ele não ter mais tempo de jogo, mas se quiserem pensar bastante só ir nas câmaras da comunidade

An amazing puzzle game and a great sequel to the original. It has great singleplayer and multiplayer campaigns, with some mindboggling puzzles, and a great story as a cherry on top. Even though I only spent 4 hours completing the singleplayer campaign, and 7 hours completing the multiplayer campaign, with spoilers nontheless, I still very much enjoyed this title, and would award it the #1 portal experiment puzzle game of all time.
Очень понравилось ! сюжет а особенно концовка

Oyun olarak güzel olmakla birlikte şeytani mesajlar içeren bir senaryoya sahip. Oyunda "Sana hükmedeceğim, seni sürekli gözetleyeceğim, sen bir çöp kadar değersizsin, annen baban seni istemiyor, bana itaat edeceksin, ben sonsuza kadar yaşayacağım sen öleceksin" gibi insanların bilinçaltına mesaj yollayan diyaloglar bulunuyor.

Transhumanizm de oyunda yoğun olarak işlenmiş. İnsan gibi konuşan robotlar ve yönettiğiniz karaktere ve her yere hükmetmeleri, şeytani yapılanmanın gelecekte insanlık için neyi planladığını gösteriyor aslında.

Portal gibi oyunlar, insanlara vermek istediği mesaj konusunda iyi niyetli değiller. Covid-19 gibi virüs salgını bahanesiyle  insanları yaşayamayacak hale getiren kötü niyetli şeytani yapılanmaların amaçlarına kimse alet olmamalıdır.

Dediğim gibi oyun olarak kafa çalıştırıcı ve güzel, verdiği mesajlar çok yanlış.
Another wonderful entry in the Portal series and what a funny ride it is my second playthrough,
I thought Portal 1 was hard, but yet again Portal 2 way harder and more confusing. Cant wait for Portal 3, can you?

尽管我想写一些《传送门2》的优点，好好夸一下这款游戏，但看到测评中的其他大佬以及网络上对《传送门2》的赏析我就知道我没必要写那些。
但《传送门2》真的让我感到震撼。
当年玩完传送门1之后就有很长的一段时间没在玩2，因为我觉得传送门1已经足够优秀，可能2给不了我震撼。但事实还是打了我的脸。
当我穿过开头的房间和披满植被的测试，当我捡到复活GLaDOS并捡到双门传送枪之后，当我击败GLaDOS惠特莉却反水之后，当我和GLaDOS探寻并逃出旧设施之后，当我把门开在月球上之后。
我就被彻底震撼了。
尽管现在我已经玩完了《传送门2》，尽管从剧情上来说《传送门2》已经完结，没有3也是合情合理。但我仍希望传送门系列能有一个3。

A classic, have to have.
Really good champian, good multiplayer, cool

Ta gra wymaga użycia szarych komórek, więc nie polecam dla osób które nie lubią myśleć. Ale gra jest bardzo inteligentna i kunszt dobrej gry solo oraz co-op. Przejście gry na 100% nie powinno zająć więcej niż 40h przy spokojnej grze. Pozdrawiam Bartusia z którym przeszedłem co-opa.
